Class Person

java.lang.Object
Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Customer
abstract class Person
extends java.lang.Object
Person class is an abstract class that holds certain information about a person, with this information the user is able to perform certain actions like adding an account to the persons scope, or viewing all the accounts they have
Since:
March 15,2021

    • Person

      public Person()
      Default Constructor of the Person Class

    • Person

      public Person​(java.lang.String firstNameIn, java.lang.String lastNameIn, java.lang.String dateOfBirthIn, int identificationNumberIn, java.lang.String addressIn, java.lang.String phoneNumberIn)
      Makes an instance of the Person class, with firstname, lastname, DOB, ID number, address, and phone number all identified
      Parameters:
      firstNameIn - persons first name
      lastNameIn - persons last name
      dateOfBirthIn - persons date of birth
      identificationNumberIn - persons ID/SSN number
      addressIn - persons address
      phoneNumberIn - persons phone number

    • addAccount

      public void addAccount​(Account accountIn, Customer client)
      Adds an account to the users list of accounts in its scope
      Parameters:
      accountIn - instance of an Account class that would be added into users list
      client - instance of a Customer class that adds name to account

    • viewAccounts

      public void viewAccounts​(Customer customerIn)
      Views all the accounts a customer has, and prints them out
      Parameters:
      customerIn - the customer whose accounts are to be evaluated
